RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Sex eject chance
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how often the pawn ejects or transfers their prey during sexual interactions.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Extra Loose
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] just can't keep prey inside $pAccself, any time [PAWN_pronoun] has sex and could eject [PAWN_possessive] prey, [PAWN_pronoun] will.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Loose
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has a loose grip on $pAcc prey, so [PAWN_pronoun] is 50% more likely to leave her ownership once [PAWN_pronoun] gets down and busy.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] ejects prey as often as anyone else.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Rare
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] knows how to keep [PAWN_possessive] prey inside, [PAWN_pronoun] is only half as likely to eject [PAWN_possessive] prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Iron Hold
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] runs a tight ship and even tigher innards, [PAWN_pronoun] will never eject or transfer prey.
